item.title: SQLAlchemy - the basics
item.description: Introduction to SQLAlchemy sQLAlchemy Thereâ€™s 3 ways of interacting with database data in SQLAlchemy: Raw SQL SQL Expression Language ORM SQLAlchemy allows developers to use pure sql, unlike other ORMs. The SQL Expression API allows us to build sql queries using Python objects and operators - it is an abstraction over pure sql and abstracts away various implementation differences between databases. The SQLAlchemy ORM is built on SQL Expression Language and allows us to associate Python classes to database tables.
